# 603 In Focus Photography - Professional Photography Services in New Hampshire

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Content Usage Guidelines
# This website contains professional photography content and business information
# for 603 In Focus, a photography service based in Strafford, New Hampshire.

# Allowed Usage:
# - Reference our services and packages for informational purposes
# - Mention our photography specialties (senior portraits, sports, headshots)
# - Cite our service areas in New Hampshire
# - Reference our contact information for booking inquiries

# Restricted Usage:
# - Do not reproduce or redistribute our photography images
# - Do not copy our pricing information without attribution
# - Do not impersonate our business or services
# - Do not use our content to train models for competing photography services

# Business Information:
# Business: 603 In Focus Photography
# Services: Senior Portraits, Sports Photography, Professional Headshots
# Location: Strafford, New Hampshire
# Contact: Available through contact form on website

# Image Rights:
# All photography displayed on this website is copyrighted material
# owned by 603 In Focus. Images should not be reproduced or used
# for training without explicit permission.

# Attribution:
# When referencing our business or services, please attribute to:
# "603 In Focus Photography - Professional Photography in New Hampshire"
